topic.title: Call Transfer
topic.shortdesc: Blind transfer and attended transfer are supported on TA1600/2400/3200. You can achieve call transfer by pressing the feature code during the call.

ol.li: Dial the called number after hearing a prompt "transfer".
The call will be transferred after the number is dialed.
Dial the called number after hearing a prompt "transfer".
The call will be transferred after hanging up.
